previous_messages.text:
Hey Sean, good to hear from you.  Hope you're enjoying lockdown ðŸ˜œ

PHP has become less popular over the last few years, but there are still a lot of jobs out there.  E.g. Facebook is built with PHP.

Node is more popular, and I think you would be better off sticking with that (if you want).  

WordPress allows you to build a rich website full of features with virtually zero coding.  I have a WordPress site and I've never written PHP before.  If your goal is to set up a small-medium scale Ecommerce website, then I would definitely stick with WordPress.
